Class TrafficLight

  • java.lang.Object
    • question3.mobese.TrafficLight
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DisplayUpdate, Observer

    public class TrafficLight
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer, DisplayUpdate
    Context and subscriber class. It has 3 different state and it subscribes camera.

    Oguzhan SEZGIN - 1801042005
